com.digi.xbee.api

Class RemoteThreadDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.AbstractXBeeDevice
      • com.digi.xbee.api.RemoteXBeeDevice
        • com.digi.xbee.api.RemoteThreadDevice

  • public class RemoteThreadDevice
extends RemoteXBeeDevice
    This class represents a remote Thread device.
    Since:
    1.2.1
    See Also:
    RemoteDigiMeshDevice, RemoteDigiPointDevice, RemoteRaw802Device, RemoteXBeeDevice, RemoteZigBeeDevice

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteThreadDevice

        public RemoteThreadDevice(AbstractXBeeDevice localXBeeDevice,
                          Inet6Address ipv6Addr)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteThreadDevice object with the given local XBeeDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local XBee device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote Thread device.
        ipv6Addr - The IPv6 address to identify this remote Thread device.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true or if localXBeeDevice.getXBeeProtocol() != XBeeProtocol.THREAD.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if ipv6addr == null.
        See Also:
        RemoteThreadDevice(ThreadDevice, Inet6Address), RemoteThreadDevice(AbstractXBeeDevice, Inet6Address, String), XBeeDevice, Inet6Address

      • RemoteThreadDevice

        public RemoteThreadDevice(AbstractXBeeDevice localXBeeDevice,
                          Inet6Address ipv6Addr,
                          String ni)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteThreadDevice object with the given local XBeeDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local XBee device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote Thread device.
        ipv6Addr - The IPv6 address to identify this remote Thread device.
        ni - The node identifier of this remote Thread device. It might be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true or if localXBeeDevice.getXBeeProtocol() != XBeeProtocol.THREAD.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if ipv6Address == null.
        See Also:
        RemoteThreadDevice(ThreadDevice, Inet6Address), RemoteThreadDevice(AbstractXBeeDevice, Inet6Address), XBeeDevice, Inet6Address

      • RemoteThreadDevice

        public RemoteThreadDevice(ThreadDevice localXBeeDevice,
                          Inet6Address ipv6Addr)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteThreadDevice object with the given local ThreadDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local Thread device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote Thread device.
        ipv6Addr - The IPv6 address to identify this remote Thread device.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if ipv6addr == null.
        See Also:
        RemoteThreadDevice(AbstractXBeeDevice, Inet6Address), RemoteThreadDevice(AbstractXBeeDevice, Inet6Address, String), ThreadDevice, Inet6Address

    • Method Detail

      • forceDisassociate

        public void forceDisassociate()
                       throws TimeoutException,
                              XBeeException
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Forces this XBee device to immediately disassociate from the network and re-attempt to associate.

        Only valid for End Devices.

        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if there is a timeout executing the disassociation command.
        XBeeException - if there is any other XBee related exception.
        See Also:
        AbstractXBeeDevice.getAssociationIndicationStatus()

      • getThreadAssociationIndicationStatus

        public ThreadAssociationIndicationStatus getThreadAssociationIndicationStatus()
                                                                       throws TimeoutException,
                                                                              XBeeException
        Returns the current association status of this Thread device.
        Returns:
        The association indication status of the Thread device.
        Throws:
        InterfaceNotOpenException - if this device connection is not open.
        TimeoutException - if there is a timeout getting the association indication status.
        XBeeException - if there is any other XBee related exception.
        See Also:
        ThreadAssociationIndicationStatus

      • getXBeeProtocol

        public XBeeProtocol getXBeeProtocol()
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns the XBee Protocol of this XBee device.

        To refresh this value use the AbstractXBeeDevice.readDeviceInfo() method.

        Overrides:
        getXBeeProtocol in class AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns:
        The XBee device protocol.
        See Also:
        XBeeProtocol
